title: World Pride Weekend
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, we talk about KidFury's #305Live, all of our World Pride festivities, people licking cartons of ice cream at the supermarket and other pop culture weirdness.

THE FRIEND ZONE LIVE IN NEW YORK. 4TH ANNIVERSARY SHOW ON SATURDAY, AUGUST 10TH - Tickets available now www.thefriendzonelive.com

Wellness Segment - Lone Natural Deodorant (works extremely well even in this Summer heat) https://lonedeodorant.com/collections/natural-deodorant-1/products/bold-deodorant-sweet-lavender

Black Business of the Week - Harlem Chocolate Factory https://harlemchocolatefactory.com

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Warby Parker - High quality, good looking prescription eyewear for a fraction of the price. Head to https://www.warbyparker.com/FRIENDZONE to order your FREE home try-ons today.

Simple Health - A better way to get birth control is here! Get the $20 prescription fee waived by going to https://www.simplehealth.com/FRIENDZONE
or entering code FRIENDZONE at checkout.

Talkspace - Therapy for how we live today. Use code ZONE to get $65 off your first month and show support for this show.

Follow us online:
https://twitter.com/FriendZonePod
https://www.facebook.com/TheFriendZonePodcast

Have a dope day!
